Title: Snakes and Whatnot
Writer: Jonathan Tropper (created by), David Schickler (created by), Halley Wegryn Gross
Actors: Antony Starr, Ivana Milicevic, Ulrich Thomsen, Frankie Faison
Plot: Nola returns to Banshee. Proctor's mother ails from a disease. Carrie must choose between the heist and her relationship with Colonel Douglas Stowe.
